mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Recommends two friends on tour through southern country: Mr. Correa, scientist from Portugal, and Francis Gilmer, son of David Gilmer of this neighbourhood; botany their favourite study; Knoxville their first destination.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
Gilmer, Francis Walker, 1790-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1815 September 22, Poplar Forest, [Beford County, Virginia] to [John] Rhea, Member of Congress, n.p.
